verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yah ye the LORD הַֽ֭לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> shem ye the name יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD הַֽ֝לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu praise עַבְדֵ֥י <WH5650> 'av-Dei [him] O ye servants יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

שֶׁ֣֭עֹֽמְדִים <WH5975> 'O-me-dim Ye that stand בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD בְּ֝חַצְר֗וֹת <WH2691> be-chatz-Rot, in the courts בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit of the house אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. of our God

הַֽ֭לְלוּ־ <WH1984> Hal-lu- Praise יָהּ <WH3050> yah the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> Tov [is] good יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; for the LORD זַמְּר֥וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru sing praises לִ֝שְׁמ֗וֹ <WH8034> lish-Mo, unto his name כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for נָעִֽים׃ <WH5273> na-'Im. for [it is] pleasant

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob בָּחַ֣ר <WH977> ba-Char hath chosen ל֣וֹ lo יָ֑הּ <WH3050> Yah; For the LORD יִ֝שְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, unto himself [and] Israel לִסְגֻלָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH5459> lis-gul-la-To. for his peculiar treasure

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יָ֭דַעְתִּי <WH3045> Ya-da'-ti For I know כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for גָד֣וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol [is] great יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; that the LORD וַ֝אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <WH136> va-'a-do-Nei-nu, our Lord מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. [is] above all gods

כֹּ֤ל <WH3605> kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> cha-Fetz pleased יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Whatsoever the LORD עָ֫שָׂ֥ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah [that] did בַּשָּׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim he in heaven וּבָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> u-va-'A-retz; and in earth בַּ֝יַּמִּ֗ים <WH3220> bai-yam-Mim, in the seas וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all תְּהוֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH8415> te-ho-Mot. and all deep places

מַֽעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> ma-'a-Leh to ascend נְשִׂאִים֮ <WH5387> ne-si-'Im He causeth the vapours מִקְצֵ֪ה <WH7097> mik-Tzeh from the ends הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the earth בְּרָקִ֣ים <WH1300> be-ra-Kim lightnings לַמָּטָ֣ר <WH4306> lam-ma-Tar for the rain עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah; he maketh מֽוֹצֵא־ <WH3318> mo-tze- he bringeth ר֝וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach the wind מֵאֽוֹצְרוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH214> me-'otz-ro-Tav. out of his treasuries

שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה <WH5221> hik-kah Who smote בְּכוֹרֵ֣י <WH1060> be-cho-Rei the firstborn מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt מֵ֝אָדָ֗ם <WH120> me-'a-Dam, both of man עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against בְּהֵמָֽה׃ <WH929> be-he-Mah. and beast

שָׁלַ֤ח׀ <WH7971> sha-Lach [Who] sent אֹת֣וֹת <WH226> o-Tot tokens וּ֭מֹפְתִים <WH4159> U-mo-fe-tim and wonders בְּתוֹכֵ֣כִי <WH8432> be-to-Che-chi into the midst מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of thee O Egypt בְּ֝פַרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> be-far-'Oh, upon Pharaoh וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol and all עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dav. and upon all his servants

שֶֽׁ֭הִכָּה <WH5221> hik-kah Who smote גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> go-Yim nations רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> rab-Bim; great וְ֝הָרַ֗ג <WH2026> ve-ha-Rag, and slew מְלָכִ֥ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim kings עֲצוּמִֽים׃ <WH6099> 'a-tzu-Mim. mighty

לְסִיח֤וֹן׀ <WH5511> le-si-Chon Sihon מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri, of the Amorites וּ֭לְעוֹג <WH5747> U-le-'og and Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king הַבָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan; of Bashan וּ֝לְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> u-le-Chol, and all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <WH4467> mam-le-Chot and all the kingdoms כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan

וְנָתַ֣ן <WH5414> ve-na-Tan And gave אַרְצָ֣ם <WH776> 'ar-Tzam their land נַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah; [for] an heritage נַ֝חֲלָ֗ה <WH5159> na-cha-Lah, an heritage לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El unto Israel עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> am-Mo. his people

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> shim-Cha Thy name לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam; [endureth] for ever יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD זִכְרְךָ֥ <WH2143> zich-re-Cha [and] thy memorial לְדֹר־ <WH1755> le-dor- throughout all וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> va-Dor. generations

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> ya-Din will judge יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh For the LORD עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo; his people וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- on עֲ֝בָדָ֗יו <WH5650> 'a-va-Dav, himself concerning his servants יִתְנֶחָֽם׃ <WH5162> yit-ne-Cham. and he will repent

עֲצַבֵּ֣י <WH6091> 'a-tzab-Bei The idols הַ֭גּוֹיִם <WH1471> Hag-go-yim of the heathen כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef [are] silver וְזָהָ֑ב <WH2091> ve-za-Hav; and gold מַ֝עֲשֵׂ֗ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh, the work יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> ye-Dei hands אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. of men's

פֶּֽה־ <WH6310> peh- They have mouths לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> La-hem like וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יְדַבֵּ֑רוּ <WH1696> ye-dab-Be-ru; but they speak עֵינַ֥יִם <WH5869> 'ei-Na-yim not eyes לָ֝הֶ֗ם <WH1992> la-Hem, like וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יִרְאֽוּ׃ <WH7200> yir-'U. have they but they see

אָזְנַ֣יִם <WH241> 'a-ze-Na-yim They have ears לָ֭הֶם <WH1992> La-hem like וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יַאֲזִ֑ינוּ <WH238> ya-'a-Zi-nu; but they hear אַ֝֗ף <WH637> 'Af, all אֵין־ <WH369> 'ein- Nor יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- not neither is there ר֥וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach [any] breath בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <WH6310> be-fi-Hem. in their mouths

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <WH3644> Ke-mo-hem will be like יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH6213> 'o-sei-Hem; They that make כֹּ֭ל <WH3605> kol them everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <WH982> bo-Te-ach them are like unto them [so is] every one that trusteth בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit O house יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'el of Israel בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu Bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit O house אַ֝הֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, of Aaron בָּרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit O house הַ֭לֵּוִי <WH3878> Hal-le-vi of Levi בָּרֲכ֣וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu Bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD יִֽרְאֵ֥י <WH3373> yir-'Ei ye that fear יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בָּרֲכ֥וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

בָּ֘ר֤וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh be the LORD מִצִּיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> mitz-tzi-Yon, out of Zion שֹׁ֘כֵ֤ן <WH7931> sho-Chen which dwelleth יְֽרוּשָׁלִָ֗ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, at Jerusalem הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. ye the LORD
